info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 9:15PM CST until January 01 at 10:11PM CST by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Saturday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and crest near 22.7 feet Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Kaskaskia River Vandalia 18.0 15.3 Tue 9 pm 21.8 22.4 15.8 12.6 11.1 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
